arts.ttl: Niko Kovač hints at rotation against Augsburg
arts.sum: Borussia Dortmund needed 120 minutes and penalties to beat Eintracht Frankfurt on Tuesday night and ahead of Friday’s Bundesliga clash against Augsburg, Niko Kovač hinted at squad rotation. Following Stuttgart’s…

arts.ttl: Kovac gives squad update ahead of Borussia Dortmund's clash with Augsburg
